o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_ValidateSourceObject
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Comment:
A custom check to make sure the Validate function is called to update the source object Name and Code before exporting the model.
This is needed so when a joined object it's Name or Code is changed the source object Name and Code is also update (without opening the mapping).
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that all source objects are validated before an export.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: An error occured for the following source object while triggering the validate event
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript: Function %Check%(obj) Dim boolValidateSucceeded, strEventMessage ' Trigger the validate event. boolValidateSucceeded = obj.TriggerValidateEvent(strEventMessage) ' If the validate failed, write the error. If (boolValidateSucceeded = False) Then WriteError("Error while triggering validate event on source object '" & obj.Code & "': '" & strEventMessage & "'") End If ' Report the check output. %Check% = boolValidateSucceeded End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
